Class ConnectionSetupTreeFactory

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.factories.ConnectionSetupTreeFactory
public class ConnectionSetupTreeFactory extends Object
Factory that exposes a static method to create all Nodes needed to display a ConnectingState.
